the referendum is the following : Do you support the Act of Independence of the Donetsk People s Republic

the overall number of polling stations
underway in Ukraine , provoked by the current Kiev authorities and their patrons
their conscience is the death of tens of people , mourning in hundreds of families and hatred born in the hearts of millions
